name: Supplier/Labour Contractors Code of Conduct Policy

fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Outlines expectations for ethical, legal, and sustainable conduct from suppliers and labour contractors in line with WIETA/SIZA standards.

fields.label: Scope
fields.description: Applies to all suppliers, subcontractors, and labour contractors engaged with the company.

fields.label: Environmental Responsibility
options: Minimize waste, emissions, and resource use
Comply with chemical and waste regulations

fields.label: Business Integrity and Ethical Sourcing
options: Fair trade and responsible sourcing practices

fields.label: Compliance and Monitoring
options: WIETA/SIZA standards and SA laws must be followed
Training and support may be provided to improve compliance

fields.label: Reporting Violations
fields.description: All breaches must be reported through designated channels without fear of retaliation.

fields.label: Consequences of Non-Compliance
fields.description: Non-compliance may result in corrective action, contract termination, or legal consequences.

fields.label: Policy Review
fields.description: Policy reviewed regularly to stay aligned with ethical, legal, and environmental standards.
